title: Gateway National Recreation Area: Jamaica Bay People
body: Jamaica Bay People         Author and reformer Jacob Riis with his friend, President Theodore Roosevelt. Library of Congress  Gateway's Jamaica Bay Unit contains many historic and natural resources associated with the "Golden Age" of aviation, national defense, public recreation and natural resource preservation. The following are just some of the notable figures who contributed to our nation's heritage. Floyd Bennett Herbert Johnson Robert Moses Jacob Riis Samuel Tilden  Lt. Colonel Willis (U. S. Coast Artillery Corps officer, who served at Sandy Hook's Fort Hancock, and Jamaica Bay's Fort Tilden.) Famous Aviators of Floyd Bennett Field
